website_summaries.verdict: This adorable seal not only showcases our ocean's wildlife but is also the perfect shape for  everyday cuddles.
pros: Its lay-flat design is ideal for children who like to snuggle with their Beanie Boos
cons: The white fabric tends to get dirtier faster than other Beanie Boos

customer_reviews.title: Big-eyed and loveable
customer_reviews.text: She was an anniversary gift (14th - give "animals") and an unmitigated success (with a small addition to the package). ICY passed down to a favorite granddaughter and enjoys life being hugged and loved.
customer_reviews.author: Lubov Angell

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE CUTEST, MOST LOVABLE BEANIE BOOS ! !
customer_reviews.text: I COULDN'T FIND THIS IN ANY STORE SO I ORDERED IT FROM AMAZON. MY GRANDDAUGHTER IS GOING TO FALL IN LOVE WITH IT WHEN SHE OPENS HER PRESENT ON CHRISTMAS DAY. THIS SEAL IS SO SWEET LOOKING, YOU JUST HAVE TO HUG HIM. HE'S VERY SOFT, AND THOSE BIG BLUE EYES ARE ADORABLE. HE WILL BE A VERY SPECIAL ADDITION TO HER BEANIE BOO COLLECTION. I'M SO GLAD I MADE THIS PURCHASE! !
customer_reviews.author: New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: My kids saw this seal in the airport and, like any exhausted parent traveling with a toddler, I bought it for him to keep him quiet on the plane. This has become his favorite lovey... Doesn't go anywhere without it. We are on our 3rd one...
customer_reviews.author: B Boldi

customer_reviews.title: Darling little seal....
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grand-daughter loves to shop for these Beanie Boos on Amazon. She always finds something new and different to add to her collection and using Amazon Prime, she knows she will get it it 2-Days; Guaranteed! This little seal is one of her favorites!
customer_reviews.author: MississippiMom

customer_reviews.title: FAKE ty doll!!!!
customer_reviews.text: came without a tag. and this doll is not even finished!! 🤬😡🤯
customer_reviews.author: evie s.

customer_reviews.title: One of the cutest!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of my favorite beanie boos, my 6 month old daughter loves to chew on his little hands and loves cuddling him. He’s lightweight and easily cleaned. I washed and dried him on delicate and it’s basically brand new again. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for shipping and packaging. 5 stars from my great niece.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my great niece and she loves it. That's worth 5 stars right there. Shipping was 2 days just like they said and I was depending on that for her birthday. Worked out just fine. I ordered 2 others in the shipment so I am also giving them the five stars. My niece, her Mom, told me the ones she wanted, so I was looking good on my choices.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoguy

customer_reviews.title: super cute, great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my goddaughter's as for one of her Christmas gifts and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: marshmallow625

customer_reviews.title: Funny thing is some girls in his class got same ...
customer_reviews.text: My older son wanted this particular seal doll. He loves it and carries hi everywhere. Funny thing is some girls in his class got same one! I guess kids really like this kind of stuffed animal. It's pretty small if you are wondering about the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: The perfect snuggler!
customer_reviews.text: This little seal has stolen my granddaughter's heart! He is perfect for snuggling with, and you can't resist his blue eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is so cute and soft. It was a big hit when I gave it as a birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: gmd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Cute. My child loved this. It has big eyes and cute little flipper leg things. Adorable. :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This product is smaller than the previous one I bought. I wish it was more soft too.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Icy
customer_reviews.text: Icy travels everywhere with my grandson. The big blue eyes are captivating.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: So happy that I got this seal here
customer_reviews.text: A gift that went over well! I couldn't find this seal along with another animal. So happy that I got this seal here. Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute and soft baby harp seal, smaller than I expected but daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: As usual, this beanie boo is absolutely adorable, and my daughter adores it. The item arrived in a timely manner and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: MSBrownEyedGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. His name is ICY, and my son calls for him morning and night. :) He's been sleeping with him and taking him to school in his backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Marie

customer_reviews.title: Does not make any seal noises
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes this because of the sparkly eyes. It does not make any seal noises, which left me a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He has wanted this white seal for months and this was all he asked for as a birthday present. It's soft and the big eyes make it oh so cute.
customer_reviews.author: MNMD

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute and lovely. I’d like to put it on my bed. Really soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Pohl

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and BIG blue eyes❤️
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this seal! Super cute and BIG blue eyes❤️
customer_reviews.author: bmp08020

customer_reviews.title: It's like a fuzzy white slug
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest one of these Ty toys I've ever seen. It's like a fuzzy white slug.
customer_reviews.author: jkeyser123

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Yup, it is a stuffed seal. what else can you say. Daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, he has a full collection of seals now.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great item Slow delivery
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described & my daughter loves it. However I ordered the toy on Dec 6th and it was suppose to be delivered between Dec 15 & 18th. We did not receive the toy until after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SMALL, BUT CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute. Of course, it's just as it looks in the picture. It is of good quality, but remember, it is really small..
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my boyfriend who is in love with seals, cute gift!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Cuddly
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter got ICY for her birthday and she loves him. He is super soft and cuddly and cute!
customer_reviews.author: anaroselee

customer_reviews.title: so very sweet and it makes you want to get involved in ...
customer_reviews.text: so very sweet and it makes you want to get involved in what is happening to these baby harp seals
customer_reviews.author: Martie K

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be bigger than it was. Definitely the six-ish inch beanie boo. Still super cute
customer_reviews.author: Christina S

customer_reviews.title: What we paid for
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this little seal. Came in good condition and quickly from Ty
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Cuter than I imagined!!! It will be a terrific holiday gift.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beanie Boos are a favorite at our house and this one did not disappoint.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Icy is gorgeous. A perfect white, soft body and those wonderful blue glitter eyes.

customer_reviews.title: It's of good quality as well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! It's of good quality as well.

customer_reviews.text: Just as described; my daughter will love it when it shows up in her stocking for Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: Everyone adores Icy the white seal and its a good reminder to be active in protecting the endangered species
customer_reviews.text: Everyone adores Icy the white seal and its a good reminder to be active in protecting the endangered species.

customer_reviews.text: The kids love it! They sleep with it every night.
